entry.title: Replying to @joborn1977 in forgetting that trans men and trans masculine people exist, transphobes are literally opening the door to cis men being in women's spaces. not to mention making it intensely unsafe for anyone, cis or trans, who is gender noncon
entry.content: Replying to @joborn1977 in forgetting that trans men and trans masculine people exist, transphobes are literally opening the door to cis men being in women's spaces. not to mention making it intensely unsafe for anyone, cis or trans, who is gender nonconforming in their presentation. #trans #lgbt #lgbtq #queer #enby #toilets

entry.title: Replying to @janedo133 having babies is a blessing, but so is the choice and freedom to be able to transition. to have a body that I feel comfortable in and people around me who use the words that are right for me and for my body. everyone deserves that.

entry.title: Replying to @pickingpoppies68 it's hard because our neurodivergency is a core part of who we are and how we process. For me, I still feel like I have ADHD when I'm on the meds, but I also feel so much clearer and able to access more of my mind. I hope th
entry.content: Replying to @pickingpoppies68 it's hard because our neurodivergency is a core part of who we are and how we process. For me, I still feel like I have ADHD when I'm on the meds, but I also feel so much clearer and able to access more of my mind. I hope this analogy helps, it's the image I get whenever I try and think about what it feels like. #adhd #adhdmeds #nd #audhd #neurodiverse #adhdtiktok

entry.title: Replying to @fattymgatty this is a great question thank you! it's important to know that not all trans people experience gender dysphoria, but I think most people - including cis folks - experience gender euphoria. #trans #genderquestioning #lgbt #dysph
entry.content: Replying to @fattymgatty this is a great question thank you! it's important to know that not all trans people experience gender dysphoria, but I think most people - including cis folks - experience gender euphoria. #trans #genderquestioning #lgbt #dysphoria

entry.title: I didn't believe I had ADHD. and then even when I did believe it, I minimised the impact it has on my life. starting medication has meant I'm confronted with the stark contrast of what it feels like to think clearly and then have it taken away. I gaslit
entry.content: I didn't believe I had ADHD. and then even when I did believe it, I minimised the impact it has on my life. starting medication has meant I'm confronted with the stark contrast of what it feels like to think clearly and then have it taken away. I gaslit myself for so many years 😥 #adhd #adhdtiktok #medication #audhd #adhdmeds #nd

entry.title: #stitch with @VATTICA we are more similar than we are different! height, body hair, genital configuration, hormone levels etc - none of these are binary and they are all part of what we categorize as "sex" - so how can we claim sex is binary? we have att
entry.content: #stitch with @VATTICA we are more similar than we are different! height, body hair, genital configuration, hormone levels etc - none of these are binary and they are all part of what we categorize as "sex" - so how can we claim sex is binary? we have attempted to classify natural human variation down to two boxes and they don't always fit. #sex #gender #intersex #trans #nonbinary

entry.title: Replying to @user9038310355074 this comment from a midwife is genuinely shocking. when someone has recently given birth they are deserving of respect and compassion. not to mention "mum" isn't a biological term. and if you truly understood science and bio
entry.content: Replying to @user9038310355074 this comment from a midwife is genuinely shocking. when someone has recently given birth they are deserving of respect and compassion. not to mention "mum" isn't a biological term. and if you truly understood science and biology, you'd know that trans people exist. #trans #lgbt #transpregnancy #midwifery #midwife #postnataldepression #pnd

entry.title: #stitch with @Arctic Harmacist let's keep these conversations going and flip the narrative so Autism and ADHD are understood from within and not without. my understanding of what it means to be neurodivergent has completely changed thanks to community an
entry.content: #stitch with @Arctic Harmacist let's keep these conversations going and flip the narrative so Autism and ADHD are understood from within and not without. my understanding of what it means to be neurodivergent has completely changed thanks to community and social media. I am working in my internalised ableism which makes me want to mask at my own expense and allowing myself to be inconvenient. #actuallyautistic #audhd #adhd #neurospicy #neurospicycrew #queer #lgbt #trans #inconvenient

entry.content: if you're going to require that people have ID to vote then at the very least you need to make ID free to get and easily accessible (which it's not) and even then trans folks are at a disadvantage. #vote #voting #labour #trans #lgbt #leftist #socialism #localpolitics

entry.title: Replying to @kismetkat22 thanks for the question, I think some people want to cause dissent and so are giving the impression that trans people are forcing things on women, when that's the last thing we want! we are allies in the fight against patriarchy.
entry.content: Replying to @kismetkat22 thanks for the question, I think some people want to cause dissent and so are giving the impression that trans people are forcing things on women, when that's the last thing we want! we are allies in the fight against patriarchy. we are just asking to be included, especially in perinatal spaces where we (and our babies) are more at risk of exclusion. #trans #ally #chestfeeding #breastfeeding #humanmilk #chestsurgery #infantfeeding #women #midwives #healthvisitors #feminism #intersectionalfeminism

entry.title: Replying to @j.j_ghostly there's no guarantees, it really depends on your surgery and recovery as well as how hormones affect you. also don't forget if you have taken testosterone it's important to stop to get pregnant 🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #transman #chestsurgery
entry.content: Replying to @j.j_ghostly there's no guarantees, it really depends on your surgery and recovery as well as how hormones affect you. also don't forget if you have taken testosterone it's important to stop to get pregnant 🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #transman #chestsurgery #lactation #lactationconsultant #midwife #healthvisitor #lgbt #pregnancy #humanmilk

entry.title: Replying to @emenopi i should be clear that this is my experience but other trans folks have different things that trigger dysphoria and it can be unexpected what will impact you. I also think I would have had a different response if I'd have been pregna
entry.content: Replying to @emenopi i should be clear that this is my experience but other trans folks have different things that trigger dysphoria and it can be unexpected what will impact you. I also think I would have had a different response if I'd have been pregnant before ever taking testosterone as I stayed looked pretty masculine throughout #trans #transpregnancy #pregnancy #dysphoria
